items.prompt: (you / can / swim?)?
(we / should / tell / him / the truth?)?
items.answer: Should we tell him the truth?

items.prompt: (I / may / use / your pen?)?
(they / must / leave / now?)?
(he / could / play / piano / when / young?)?
items.answer: Could he play the piano when he was young?

items.prompt: (you / will / help / me / tomorrow?)?
(she / might / come / to / party?)?
items.answer: Might she come to the party?

items.prompt: (we / can / park / here?)?
(I / should / see / doctor?)?
(you / would / like / some / tea?)?
(they / must / wear / uniform?)?
(he / can / speak / Spanish?)?
(I / could / borrow / your / book?)?
(we / should / start / now?)?
(you / will / be / home / by / 6 PM?)?
items.answer: Will you be home by 6 PM?

items.prompt: (I / should / see / doctor?)?
(you / would / like / some / tea?)?
(they / must / wear / uniform?)?
(he / can / speak / Spanish?)?
(I / could / borrow / your / book?)?
(we / should / start / now?)?
(you / will / be / home / by / 6 PM?)?
items.answer: Will you be home by 6 PM?

items.prompt: ______ you please open the door for me?
When I was younger, I ______ play the piano very well.?
It ______ rain tomorrow, so take an umbrella.?
You ______ study harder if you want to pass the exam.?
I ______ be home by 6 PM tonight.?
______ we have lunch together tomorrow?
You ______ smoke in this building. It's prohibited.?
I think I ______ have left my keys at home.?
______ you mind if I use your phone?
We ______ leave now or we'll be late.?
They ______ come to the party, but they're not sure yet.?
You ______ see a doctor about that cough.?
I ______ speak French fluently when I lived in Paris.?
______ you help me with this heavy box?
She ______ be very tired after working all night.?
You ______ be more careful when crossing the street.?
I ______ finish the report by tomorrow, but I'm not sure yet.?
______ you like some coffee?
He ______ lift that heavy box on his own.?
We ______ take a taxi, it's faster.?
Мога ли да използвам телефона ти?
Трябва да тръгваме сега, иначе ще закъснеем.?
items.answer: We must leave now, or we'll be late.

items.prompt: Не бива да говориш с пълна уста.?
items.answer: You mustn't talk with your mouth full.

items.prompt: Може ли да отворя прозореца?
Той може би ще дойде на партито довечера.?
items.answer: He might come to the party tonight.

items.prompt: Не е нужно да купуваш мляко, имаме достатъчно.?
items.answer: You needn't buy milk; we have enough.

items.prompt: Ще ми помогнеш ли с домашното?
items.answer: Will you help me with my homework?

items.prompt: Трябва да внимаваш повече, когато шофираш.?
items.answer: You should be more careful when you drive.

items.prompt: Може ли да изляза по-рано днес?
Не мога да повярвам, че той каза това!?
items.answer: I can't believe he said that!

items.prompt: Трябва да работя през уикенда.?
items.answer: I must work over the weekend.

items.prompt: Можеше ли да плуваш, когато беше малък?
items.answer: Could you swim when you were little?

items.prompt: Не бива да забравяш да заключваш вратата.?
items.answer: You mustn't forget to lock the door.

items.prompt: Би ли ми казал как да стигна до гарата?
items.answer: Could you tell me how to get to the station?

items.prompt: Тя трябва да е много умна, винаги получава отлични оценки.?
items.answer: She must be very smart; she always gets excellent grades.

items.prompt: Може би ще отидем на кино довечера.?
items.answer: We might go to the cinema tonight.

items.prompt: Не можем да паркираме тук, забранено е.?
items.answer: We can't park here; it's prohibited.

items.prompt: Трябва ли да нося униформа на работа?
items.answer: Must I wear a uniform to work?

items.prompt: Бих искал да пътувам повече.?
items.answer: I would like to travel more.

items.prompt: Не бива да закъсняваш за срещи.?
items.answer: You mustn't be late for meetings.

items.prompt: Може ли да ми помогнете с тези чанти?
items.answer: Could you help me with these bags?

items.prompt: Трябва да си легнеш по-рано, изглеждаш уморен.?
items.answer: You should go to bed earlier; you look tired.

items.prompt: Ще дойдеш ли с нас на плажа утре?
items.answer: Will you come with us to the beach tomorrow?

items.prompt: Не мога да реша този проблем сам.?
items.answer: I can't solve this problem on my own.

items.prompt: Би ли ми подал солта, моля?
items.answer: Could you pass me the salt, please?

items.prompt: Не бива да ядеш толкова много сладки неща.?
items.answer: You shouldn't eat so many sweets.

items.prompt: Може ли да отворя това писмо?
Трябва да се обадиш на родителите си по-често.?
items.answer: You should call your parents more often.

items.prompt: Не е нужно да чакаш, ако бързаш.?
items.answer: You needn't wait if you're in a hurry.

items.prompt: Бихте ли говорили по-бавно, моля?
items.answer: Could you speak more slowly, please?
